scripts.start: NODE_PORT=3002 pm2 start soma-serv.js --log-date-format 'YYYY.MM.DD | HH:mm:ss' --watch --ignore-watch 'public logs node_modules wiki'  --name soma-serv
scripts.systemd-install: sudo systemctl enable soma-serv; sudo systemctl start soma-serv; sudo systemctl daemon-reload;
scripts.systemd-remove: sudo systemctl stop soma-serv; sudo systemctl disable soma-serv; sudo systemctl daemon-reload;
scripts.systemd-reinstall: npm run systemd-remove; npm run systemd-install
scripts.help:
echo "npm run ...
  certs
  expose-wifi
  systemd-install | systemd-uninstall | systemd-reinstall
  systemd-status | systemd-logs
  systemd-start | systemd-stop | systemd-restart
  start | logs | stop | restart | delete"
scripts.certs: openssl genpkey -algorithm RSA -out private.key; openssl req -new -key private.key -out csr.csr; openssl x509 -req -in csr.csr -signkey private.key -out certificate.crt
